text: The Tun Abdul Razak Memorial is a building in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, where Abdul Razak Hussein once lived. It was originally called the Sri Taman Building. The building was turned into a museum to honor him, and Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad opened it on 6 May 1982. Tun Abdul Razak lived there from 1962 until he passed away in January 1976. == References == Category:Buildings and structures by country
title: Tun Abdul Razak Memorial
